articles.title: Roche joins Moderna to include antibody test in COVID-19 vaccine trial - Reuters India
articles.description: Roche is partnering with Moderna to include a COVID-19 antibody test in the mRNA specialist's ongoing vaccine trials, the Swiss drugmaker said on Wednesday, potentially demonstrating if the vaccine is working.

articles.title: Large US study confirms Covid-19 complications: lung, kidney and cardiovascular issues - Times Now
